document_data.mainbody:
his owlbear cub was an owlbear who lived on the Sword Coast during the late 15 century DR.
The cub and the dog Scratch would become fast and inseparable friends, chasing each other around camp, were they both to join the Absolute Adversaries.
In the , the cub and his mother lived in a cave near the Risen Road and Moonhaven. The cub had an older brother, but his mother ate him.
After his mothers death, the cub was captured by a band of goblins who were loyal to the Absolute. After it ate a chicken the goblins used in their chicken chasing game, the cub was used as a replacement.
